SEARCH
Package SC2002.Project.entity

Class HDB_Officer

java.lang.Object
SC2002.Project.entity.User
SC2002.Project.entity.Applicant
SC2002.Project.entity.HDB_Officer
public class HDB_Officer extends Applicant
Represents an HDB Officer user in the BTO system.

HDB Officers extend the Applicant class and possess all applicant capabilities while also having additional responsibilities for:

  • Registering to join specific BTO projects
  • Managing project details and responding to enquiries
  • Helping applicants with flat selection and booking
  • Generating receipts for flat bookings

Fulfills the following Officer requirements:

  • Possesses all Applicant capabilities
  • Can register to join projects not applying to as an Applicant
  • Cannot be an Officer for multiple projects with overlapping application periods
  • Can view the status of registration to be an Officer for a project
  • Registration is subject to Manager approval
  • Can view project details regardless of visibility settings
  • Can respond to project enquiries
  • Handles flat selection for approved applications (updates availability, application status)
  • Generates receipts for flat bookings

    • getAssignedProjects

      public List<Project> getAssignedProjects()
      Gets the list of projects this officer is assigned to. This supports the requirement that officers can view details of projects they're handling regardless of visibility.
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable list of assigned projects

    • addAssignedProject

      public void addAssignedProject(Project project)
      Assigns a project to this officer. Called when a registration is approved by a manager.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to assign to this officer

    • removeAssignedProject

      public void removeAssignedProject(Project project)
      Removes a project assignment from this officer. Called when a registration is withdrawn or rejected.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to remove from this officer's assignments

    • getRegistrations

      public List<Registration> getRegistrations()
      Gets all project registrations submitted by this officer. This supports the requirement for officers to see their registration status for projects.
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable list of registrations

    • addRegistration

      public void addRegistration(Registration reg)
      Adds a new registration to this officer's registrations list. Called when the officer registers interest in handling a project.
      Parameters:
      reg - The registration to add
